data.name: iB Cricket - App Lab
data.description:
Link to Main Store App:
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5437449896288644/
Note: Meta Main Store version supports Quest2 only.

A sport with 2.5 billion fans across the world is now in VR as iB Cricket (vSport). Step into immersive world-class stadiums with thousands cheering for you and hit the ball out of the park. Our realistic physics makes it intuitive to learn the sport within 10 mins. 

Till date, over 150 million balls have been played by people from 40+ countries, including both cricketing & non-cricketing nations. 98% of them said that iB Cricket is amazing! iB Cricket has also received appreciation from 100+ world-class Cricketers.
- Numerous Bowling Options
- Intelligent fielding based on built-in AI
- Multiple Stadiums
- PvP:  Bowl to your friends & challenge them in a one-on-one match. 
- Leagues & Tournaments
- Multiple Cricket Formats: 20, 50, unlimited overs
- Coaching Module 

Hone your skills, compete in global tournaments & become a vSport star.

changelog.change_log:
1. RenderScale greater than 1.4 for is causing major crashes for the players. So we are restricting renderscale to a max of 1.4. By default all players render scale will be set to 1.2
2. Bat-Grip adjustment will now work with iB Bat as well
3. Quest 1 controllers are added in grip settings and other places
4. Naming bats and applying bat skin is now easy
5. Minor UI corrections in Campaigns
6. Milestone Displays are corrected(30, 50, 100 etc)
7. Few End ball optimizations have been done. Game will be more smoother.

New Features:

1. Campaign Mode
    1.1  5 Difficulties - Very Easy, Easy, Medium, Hard, Real
    1.2 6 Stages - Backyard, Academy, Province, Zonal, National, International
    1.3. New dressing rooms and stadiums for each stage.
    1.4. Each stage ends with a Tournament.

2. Avatars (Beta)
    2.1. Each person can choose from a limited set which will be improved with time.

3. Weekly LeaderboardsLeader boards in Quickstart



Enhancements:

1. Change in Head Crease based on Height and head vertical position 

2. Settings Available during the match i.e inside the stadium

3. View replay from multiple angles within the match

4. Multiple Stadiums in Dual player League matches.

5. Practice Mode
    5.1. Insane bowling added
    5.2. White ball, Red ball choosing
    5.3. Around the wicket bowling added
    5.4. Line and length bowling based on selection corrected.

6. Fielding
    6.1. Fielding Level is equivalent with bowling level in all match types
    6.2. Inner circle and boundary dive animations corrected
    6.3. Charging while at boundary has been improved.

7. Bowler names in quick start are taken from league bowler names user sets

8. Offside wide has been made more strict

9. Empty(For few match types) Scoreboard on the left side in a match will now has information of
    9.1. Bowling style
    9.2. Projected Score/ Required Run Rate
    9.3. Batsman on strike 

10. Settings
    10.1. Ball Trail option is corrected
    10.2. Quick access button for
        - Naming bats
        - Adjust bat grip
        - Game settings are added in home

11. Score Display Delay is removed.

12. Tournaments Expires in Timer has been corrected

13. Lighting in overcast conditions has been improved.

14. Around the wicket special ball animations is improved.

15. Few other minor bugs
    15.1. Exit button always available during a match
    15.2. UI duplication has been corrected.

16. Quickplay matches will Save match progress only when a player press Exit button while quitting the match.

17. No autosave option for tournament matches. From now on Knockout tournament matches should be played in a single go if you quit the latest score will be considered,

18.  PVP
    18.1. Dynamic Field setting during a match
    18.2. Fieldset change displayed during next ball button (Common for other matches as well)
    18.3. Yorker Region is added.

    * Able to set close fielders in fieldset with zoom in option

9 Strong hand selection for Local PvP for both the innings
10 Displaying Leaderboard at end of the match for single player league matches
11 Confirmation when switching league
12 Bat Grip adjustment allowed size increased to support Valve Index controllers

    * Bowl from Laptop and Bat from your Oculus Quest.
    * Steam App Link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1727040/iB_Cricket_Companion/

Make sure you login with the same oculus account as you have your iB Cricket VR game is after installing the app.


Critical Issues corrected :

1. Game Pause while internet issue when Automatic next ball is chosen.
2. Performance has been improved for smooth game experience without skip frames.


Enhancements :

1. Leagues spinners for each Pitch has been reduced
        * Green Pitch - 0 spinners. So for bowling presets everyone is given 9 bowlers 1 extra right arm medium fast.
        * Normal Pitch, Bouncy Pitch - 1 spinner
        * Dry Pitch - 2 spinner both the spinners same level for time being

2. Default field sets tab is given for all the players. You can use them while setting PVP or bowling presets

3. All the bowling presets have reset due to above changes.
    * Please note you can see the above changes in the new matches not for in progress ones.

4. All bat stats will be corrected.

5. Max Height Of Batsman in each delivery is included to improve the wide calls.
    * Also same height profile will be used to identify number players playing in an account. If more than 5 batsman profiles are detected in an account for more than 4 days in a month the account will be put on hold and the players need to contact support.

6. Helper UI text at controller / bat selection section.

7. Optimized the msg flow for PVP matches to reduce the price of servers.

8. Changes done to worm graph for 50 over league matches. 

9. When wide ball is bowled in leagues, picking the appropriate ball for next delivery is added so wides will be reduced.

10. Setting the size of batsman character based on his height in replay for a batsman.

11. Edges 0 to 50 deviation is also been implemented.
